enchantment.indexed.essence.desc: No effect, but saturated with experience
enchantment.indexed.slow_burn.desc: Fireworks burn for longer at the cost of speed
enchantment.indexed.quick_flight.desc: Fireworks give a greater speed boost at the expense of burn time
enchantment.indexed.keeping.desc: May magically remain with you upon death
enchantment.indexed.hidden_curse.desc: Item is invisible while worn or wielded
advancements.indexed.story.root.title: Indexed
advancements.indexed.story.overcharge.de: Use the enchanting table to get an item with more slots than its max capacity.
advancements.indexed.story.enchant_gold_: Increase your chances of getting high level enchantments by enchanting a gold bound book.
advancements.indexed.story.repair_item.d: Repair an item in an anvil using repair items instead of experience.
advancements.indexed.story.keeping.title: They're a Keeper
advancements.indexed.story.keeping.descr: Enchant an item with Keeping V so you don't lose it on death.
advancements.indexed.story.forgery.title: Adept Blacksmith
advancements.indexed.story.forgery.descr: Get an item with Forgery to reduce its repair cost.
Equip a full set of Netherite armor with Curse of the Hidden.
advancements.indexed.story.grind_essence: Grind an Essence book to get a large sum of experience.
advancements.indexed.story.max_sharpness: Put Sharpness V and Smite V on the same item.
advancements.indexed.story.unbreakable.d: Put Mending V and Unbreaking V on the same item.
advancements.indexed.story.max_gold.desc: Use a maxxed or overcharged gold sword.
advancements.indexed.story.slow_burn.des: Put Slow Burn on an Elytra to make the rockets last longer and reduce the boost velocity.
advancements.indexed.story.use_crystal_g: Use an empty hand on a full Crystal Globe to extract its contents.
advancements.indexed.story.fill_crystal_: Draw power from a Crystal Globe surrounded by amethyst clusters.
advancements.indexed.story.enchanted.des: Use an enchanting table while under the Enchanted status effect.
